Occupational health

Get cost-effective employees care service

We work with employers of all sizes and from a variety of industries to provide a full range of medical services that best serve your needs.

Work with us

About our service briefly

Watch time 1min 34s

We collaborate with you on care and treatment plans to help ensure the timely return of your employee to work. We are committed to providing the highest quality and most cost-effective care available in Occupational Health.

We want to be your 1st Choice

At First Choice Urgent Care, our board-certified physicians and experienced medical staff offer convenient, reliable and quality services in a friendly, professional environment 365 days/year.

Certified clinic

We received Certified Urgent Care Designation from the Urgent Care Assosication of America

Over 25 years

We have great benefit of experience in Occupational Health Services and Care

Wide working hours

We’re here 365 days/year – 9 a.m to 9 p.m. seven days/week, and 9 a.m. – 5 p.m on holidays

Services

We provide a full range of medical services

Pre-employment/return-to-work physicals

Regulatory and compliance exams including DOT

Comprehensive Onsite Services

Routine/Random/Post-accident drug testing (w/MRO)

Workplace Injury and Illness

Breath Alcohol Test

Lab tests, X-rays and EKG

TB testing

Vaccinations: Tetanus, Flu, Hepatitis B, MMR and TB

Audiograms & Vision Testing

Surveillance Physicals

Training: OSHA compliance, DOT, CPR, First Aid, AED and employee health and safety training solution

Drug and breath alcohol testing

We are open an hour earlier, 8 a.m., for drug and breath alcohol testing Monday thru Friday.

Special offers

DOT Exams by a Medical Examiner

1st Choice is a part of Occmed connect Network

Watch time 1min 54s

First Choice Urgent Care has joined the OccMed Connect Network to bring over 25 years’ experience in Occupational Health Services and Care
